title.narrative: Conservation of the 6th-Century Rosalila Temple at the Maya Site of Copan

description.narrative: Discovered in 1989 within the newer Temple 16 at the ancient Maya site of Copan, the Rosalila Temple is one of the best-preserved ancient buildings of the Maya period. title.narrative: INL CARSI GREAT Regional Grant Honduras

description.narrative: INL CARSI GREAT Regional Grant Honduras Covers grants (including revenue- sharing), subsidies, gratuities, and other aid for which cash payments are made to states, other political subdivisions, corporations, associations, and individuals; contributions to international societies, commissions, proceedings, or projects, whether in lump sum or as quotas of expenses; contributions fixed by treaty; grants to foreign countries; taxes imposed by taxing authorities where the Federal Government has consented to taxation (excluding the employers share of Federal Insurance Contribution Act taxes); and payments in lieu of taxes. Includes readjustment and other benefits for veterans, other than indemnities for death or disability.
